name: Motorcylce Racing in 3D City
description:
Feel the speed and adrenaline racing the traffic trough the city.
Race and have fun against other players.

Motorcylce Racing in 3D City is a fast and challenging driving game that lets you drive past cars and trucks at incredible fast speeds on your bike. Dodge traffic, increase your speed and become the best rider!

If you love motorcycle games, this is the game you've been waiting for!

As you go faster and further on the road you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better and faster motorcycles.
There's no time to lose! Choose your motorcycle and show other bikers that no one can reach you!

◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- Awesome bikes and riders!
- Extreme speed!
- Very simple controls!
- Incredible graphics!
- Leaderboards and achievements!

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down
- Touch wheelie button to do wheelies

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you drive the more points you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus points and cash
- If you do overtakes fast, you can do combos and win more points
- When driving over 80 kmh, make a wheelie to get bonus points and cash

Have fun by downloading this top motorcycle racing game.

Do not forget to give us a review!
